com.jacobschneider.engine.math.vectorcalc

Interface ScalerField

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScalerField, CartesianScalerField, SumScalerField

    public interface ScalerField
    A scaler field over 3 dimensional real space
    Author:
    Jacob

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScalerField add(ScalerField otherField)
      Adds this scaler field to another.
      double getValue(Vector3 point)
      The scaler value returned by this scaler field at a certain point in space
      Vector3 gradient(Vector3 point)
      The gradient of the scaler field at a certain point in the space
      Vector3 gradientTraversal(Vector3 point, double desiredPotential)
      Traverses a path of steepest ascent/descent until the desired potential is reached.
      Manifold toManifold(double potential)
      Converts this scaler field to a manifold at a certain potential
      VectorField toVectorField()
      Converts this scaler field into a vector field corresponding to the negative gradient of this scaler field.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        double getValue(Vector3 point)
        The scaler value returned by this scaler field at a certain point in space
        Parameters:
        point - the point at which to evaluate the scaler field
        Returns:
        The scaler value

      • gradient

        Vector3 gradient(Vector3 point)
        The gradient of the scaler field at a certain point in the space
        Parameters:
        point - the point at which to evaluate the gradient of this scaler field
        Returns:
        the resulting gradient

      • toVectorField

        VectorField toVectorField()
        Converts this scaler field into a vector field corresponding to the negative gradient of this scaler field. If this scaler field represents a potential then this function will return a force field representing the force enacted by the potential.
        Returns:
        a vector field equal to the negative gradient of this scaler field

      • add

        ScalerField add(ScalerField otherField)
        Adds this scaler field to another.
        Parameters:
        otherField - the other scaler field to be summed
        Returns:
        the resulting sum

      • toManifold

        Manifold toManifold(double potential)
        Converts this scaler field to a manifold at a certain potential
        Parameters:
        potential - the potential value
        Returns:
        the resulting manifold

      • gradientTraversal

        Vector3 gradientTraversal(Vector3 point,
                          double desiredPotential)
        Traverses a path of steepest ascent/descent until the desired potential is reached.
        Parameters:
        point - starting point
        desiredPotential - the potential you want to reach
        Returns:
        the ending point of the path once the potential is reached
